title: Bryoxiphium
text:
Bryoxiphium is the only genus of <a href="moss">moss</a> in family Bryoxiphiaceae, described as a genus in 1869.
"Bryoxiphium" is native to <a href="North%20America">North America</a>, <a href="East%20Asia">East Asia</a>, and certain islands in the <a href="North%20Atlantic">North Atlantic</a>.
